scripts.build: tsc && cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && npm run copy-frontend
scripts.copy-frontend: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const src = 'frontend/dist'; const dest = 'dist/frontend'; if (!fs.existsSync(dest)) fs.mkdirSync(dest, { recursive: true }); fs.cpSync(src, dest, { recursive: true });"
